item.title: Trump Says He'll 'Tell It Like It Is' to Congress
item.description: President Donald Trump vowed to "tell it like it is" during his "big" appearance before a joint session of Congress on Tuesday night.

item.title: Musk Backs Call for US to Leave NATO, UN
item.description: Elon Musk supported calls for the United States to withdraw from NATO and the United Nations.
